## Block.setInsertProperties() method

Apply insert properties to field

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInsertProperties(props: FieldProperties, field: string, clazz?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md) | The insert properties to apply. |
|  field | string | The name of the field to apply insert properties to. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ narrow down on class |

**Returns:**

void
